com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class RenderingPipelineGL2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.RenderingPipelineGL2

  • public class RenderingPipelineGL2
extends java.lang.Object
    Rendering pipeline for rendering a scene. This rendering pipeline requires OpenGL 2.0, and GLSL 1.0. Renderes a scene with parallax layers, but no advanced effects

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public static void render(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
          Viewport viewport,
          SceneObjectManager sceneObjectManager,
          SceneEffectsManager sceneEffectsManager,
          Scene.Layer... excluded)
        Rendering pipeline for rendering a scene. This rendering pipeline requires OpenGL 2.0, and GLSL 1.0. Renderes a scene with parallax layers, but no advanced effects
        Parameters:
        gl - OpenGl context
        viewport - Viewport belonging to the scene
        sceneObjectManager - SceneObjectManager of the scene
        sceneEffectsManager - SceneEffectsManager of the scene
        excluded - optional parameter of layers to exclude from the rendering
